summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Acad√©mie Jacques Levinet CRM Phase 1 MVP. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend UI loads correctly with proper dark theme design. Authentication, dashboard, and navigation work perfectly. Minor UI interaction issue found with dropdown selections in member creation modal.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection for Technical Director not clickable in modal - element not visible error
ui_bugs.selector: text=Jean Dupont Test - Paris in select dropdown
ui_bugs.details: The dropdown options in the member creation modal are not properly accessible for selection. This prevents completing the member creation flow.

design_issues.details: Dark theme (#0B1120 background), Oswald font for headings, proper color scheme implemented. All design requirements met.

passed_tests: Backend CRUD operations for technical directors
Frontend landing page load and design
Frontend dashboard display with charts and stats
Frontend technical directors page and creation

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown selection issue in member creation modal. The technical director dropdown options are not clickable due to visibility/z-index issues in the modal. This prevents completing the member creation workflow through the UI.
